it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties

Class ReplicatingProperty<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.Property<V>
      • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.SimpleProperty<V>
        • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.attachedProperties.ReplicatingProperty<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the value held by the property.

    public class ReplicatingProperty<V>
extends SimpleProperty<V>
    A class for properties attached to targets implementing Replicating. The class automatically attach a copy of itself to new replicas thus. Listeners are registered also for this new copy. Therefore, functionality provided is similar to SharedProperty, but results in a copy-on-write behavior across the replicas. The class can be attached also to targets not implementing Replicating, but the automatic sharing behavior will not be enabled (on these).

      • onReplicated

        protected void onReplicated(Replicating original,
                Replicating copy)
        This method is called when a PropertyTarget holding the property is replicated in order to attach a copy of this property to the replica and listen for its replications. Inherit this method to intercept replications and filter automatic registration of ReplicationListeners Property.listeners and attachment of this property.
        Parameters:
        original -
        copy -
